text: The 1979 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 35th edition of the women's singles championship. Ge Xin'ai defeated Li Song Suk in the final by three sets to nil, to win the title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1979 in women's table tennis
title: 1979 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
